products.title: Speciality Beach Bird Roller Blind
products.description: The friendly snipe bird can be seen printed across the soft yellow hue backed roller blind, ideal for adding a focal point to your room and with the different coloured bird print across the fabric, this blind will quickly become a firm favorite in your home. Choose this design to come on either a dimout, blackout or waterproof fabric to use in windows across your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Robin N' Frost Roller Blind
products.description: The icy blue colour of the robin n frost roller is perfect for adding a cooler tone to your room - with the icy blue backing and the white print overlaying it makes this blind unique and cool - in more ways than one. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

products.title: Speciality White Crane Roller Blind
products.description: A strong and bold pattern, the speciality white crane is great for decor's that require a bold repeating pattern that won't dominate the room because of its colour. The blue and white contrast is perfect for rooms across your home, and you can choose this blind to come as either a dimout, blackout or waterproof fabric. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Henge Reflection Roller Blind
products.description: The stylish blue tone and repeating pattern on the henge reflection gives this blind a modern and stylish look and can be used anywhere across your home. Choose blackout for your bedroom and waterproof if you're installing into a bathroom. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.
